items.content_html: Ever wanted to create a mobile menu in a react app but you keep feeling lazy about it?. react-mobile-drawer is a lightweight, customizable drawer component designed specifically for mobile view in React applications. With smooth animations and intuitive swipe gestures...

items.content_html: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Mongo DB database is created and utilized because of the dynamic nature of posts and the type of data being unstructured.
items.title: Mudit2003/cloudsek-assignment: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Mongo DB database is created and utilized because of the dynamic nature of posts and the type of data being unstructured.

items.content_html: Unbloat is a powerful tool designed to help developers manage and clean up their Git repositories by identifying and handling files that were once tracked but are no longer present in the latest commits. It's particularly useful for maintaining a lightweight repo without compromising commit history.
items.title: dvho/unbloat: Unbloat is a powerful tool designed to help developers manage and clean up their Git repositories by identifying and handling files that were once tracked but are no longer present in the latest commits. items.content_html: easyAuditLogger is a lightweight and easy-to-use module designed to simplify the process of capturing and logging audit events in your Discord bot. Whether you're tracking role changes, message deletions, or user updates, easyAuditLogger handles it smoothly.

Whether you're tracking role changes, message deletions, or user updates, easyAuditLogger handles it smoothly.

items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
